title: Yuvraj Hails Ganguly As 'Great' On His New Job. Dada Responds By Calling Yuvi His 'Superstar'
text:
Yuvraj Hails Ganguly As 'Great' On His New Job. Dada Responds By Calling Yuvi His 'Superstar'

Yuvraj Hails Ganguly As 'Great' On His New Job. Dada Responds By Calling Yuvi His 'Superstar'

Sourav Ganguly was elected BCCI president will take charge on October 23.

Of all those who wished Dada on his appointment, Yuvraj Singh had a very special message for him.

Ganguly was the one who brought Yuvraj into the side and the left-hander blossomed into one of the best middle-order limited overs players we have ever produced.

bccl

He congratulated his former skipper for the great journey from being Indian captain to be the BCCI president

bccl

Just shows how much respect he has for Dada. Check it out:

Greater the man greatest the journey! Frm IndianCaptain to @BCCI president.Think it will b a gr8 insight 4 a cricketer to be an administrator & make others understand admin frm a players point of view Wish u were d president while d yoyo was in demand😂good luck dadi👊@SGanguly99 — yuvraj singh (@YUVSTRONG12) October 18, 2019

Ganguly's to reply was quick and equally heartfelt. After all Yuvraj has helped us win 2 World Cups and that is no joke.

Don't Miss 273 SHARES 1.9 K SHARES 857 SHARES 4.7 K SHARES 4.5 K SHARES

Thank u the best .. u have won India world cups .. time to do good things for the game now .. u r my super star .. god bless always — Sourav Ganguly (@SGanguly99) October 18, 2019

Ganguly is only the second cricketer to be in charge of BCCI and the first after 65 years. If the way he led the team and took charge of CAB is anything to go by, the man is expected to do great things for our cricket body.

With Inputs From TNN.
